edu.bonn.cs.wmp.views
Class WMPEditText

java.lang.Object
  EditText
      edu.bonn.cs.wmp.views.WMPEditText
All Implemented Interfaces:
WMPView
public class WMPEditText
extends EditText
implements WMPView

This is the collaborative version of a standard Android EditText. It is recommended to be used together with the RadarView awareness widget for full collaboration awareness.

Author:
sven

Nested Class Summary
 class WMPEditText.EditTextInputConnectionWrapper
          Attention: Overwrite this class (and only this!) if you want to supply your own InputConnectionWrapper to a WMPEditText view! This class handles all input to this WMPEditText and routes it through the Collaborative Editing Framework when in collaboration mode.

init

public void init()
Does all initialization work, e.g. registering the ViewUpdater and adding ourselves to the WMPViewRegistry.

getNodeName

public String getNodeName()
Returns the name of the node by which the content of this view is represented in the document of the Collaborative Editing Framework. Will be generated by using the Android resource ID or from XML in the future.

Returns:
the content node's name

setNodeName

public void setNodeName(String nodeID)
This method allows setting the name of the node by which the content of this view is represented in the document of the Collaborative Editing Framework. Will be generated automatically by using the Android resource ID or from XML in the future.

Parameters:
nodeID -

onCheckIsTextEditor

public boolean onCheckIsTextEditor()

notifyCollaboratorsOfContentChange

public void notifyCollaboratorsOfContentChange(ContentChange c)
Description copied from interface: WMPView
This method is the link to the other collaborators. The method has to take care of propagating the ContentChange to the Awareness widgets of all session takers.

Specified by:
notifyCollaboratorsOfContentChange in interface WMPView
Parameters:
c - ContentChange to be propagated to the other session takers

public void notifyExternalWMPWidgetsOfContentChange(ContentChange c)
Description copied from interface: WMPView
